column5: Well i had a great trout opener, hooked a ton of fish, landed a few of them. I was not one of the hundreds i saw fishing the spawning fish, snagging and ripping fishing from the reds...  Managed to get my new PB Steelhead, beat my previous by about 5" and 5-6lbs...  No clue how long it really was, or how much it weighed, but it was a big boy!!     Hope everyone else had fun out there!
That's a big one for sure. well done
That's a big one for sure. well done x2
Yup, that's a cow! Ya. One of them male cows that dispenses milt instead of milk  . Congrats on the PB.
Ya. One of them male cows that dispenses milt instead of milk  . Congrats on the PB.  http://cli.ps/DRMa
Nice cow! Looks like you had a good time
http://cli.ps/DRMa Love that part of that film.
Love that part of that film.  That's the first thing I thought of, I was hoping you'd get a laugh out of it
Great picture, tank of a spring bow what shoulders on that fish!
